entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:20 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:20 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
